channel.title: 508 Big tips/help need
channel.description: 1.There Is a big magic/attack bug in my server! you can attack people with magic in wild. even if you jump the ditch in edgeville and be in safe your still able to mage them. with melee and range you can't do them. it will say your not able to attack person in safe! 2. my server is a pking server with spawing. some people want to also train skills in there! and in quest list if your a starter a option called "master" will appears, how can i make it so that only it only levels up attack strength defence range mage prayer and summoning? when you click master it will disconnect and you have to relog. 3.my stupid server autorestarter is not functioning! please help me! when ever i come back i see it like always dced and players can't move![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 13, 2009, 04:50:01 pm[/size][hr]4. How Do i Fix Friends List And Ingore List! When You Relog, It Deletes Everyone In The list![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 13, 2009, 05:02:21 pm[/size][hr]omg i answered everyones question but no1 can answer mine :(

item.title: 508 Big tips/help need
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

1.There Is a big magic/attack bug in my server! you can attack people with magic in wild. even if you jump the ditch in edgeville and be in safe your still able to mage them. with melee and range you can’t do them. it will say your not able to attack person in safe!
2. my server is a pking server with spawing. some people want to also train skills in there! and in quest list if your a starter a option called “master” will appears, how can i make it so that only it only levels up attack strength defence range mage prayer and summoning? when you click master it will disconnect and you have to relog.
3.my stupid server autorestarter is not functioning! please help me! when ever i come back i see it like always dced and players can’t move![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 13, 2009, 04:50:01 pm[/size][hr]4. How Do i Fix Friends List And Ingore List! When You Relog, It Deletes Everyone In The list![br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 13, 2009, 05:02:21 pm[/size][hr]omg i answered everyones question but no1 can answer mine
